name: The Omnidelirium Series: Lamb of Ao Mua'ga
description:
A servant of Ao Mua'ga, The White Lamb is a dubious genie seeking to grant all life it's desires of escaping death and achieving eternity. 
Either summoned or wandered into, The Lamb will fulfill any wish upon vocal command in the invaded universe. From there, the process of "liberation" begins.

The wish granted to these lifeforms is an but an illusion.  Instead of altering the reality they exist in, the poor victims are warped to Ao Mua'ga's marshlands, to rot inside their perfect reality in a maddening state of psychosis. 

The fever dream is indistinguishable from real and unreal, and becomes the trigger which makes the mind fry to a hedonistic state. As time passes, the dream will make them degrade to junkies of pleasure, eventually defiling their own morals and ethics to surpass taboos and masochisms not even imaginable.

The victim reach the limits of terrifying experience, all for The Lamb to proclaim itself as the mercy and grace of The Omnidelirium, as well as delighting as being it's tormentor.
